description: Extraordinary Family Farm in Pedrezuela Engel & Volkers offers this magnificent house with a plot of 20 hectares of junipers and pine trees, located on the border between San Agustin de Guadalix and El Molar. We can find it in a totally private environment, easily accessible from the road through a private road with access gate from the main road. We access the property and we find a beautiful fenced garden, the main entrance to the house and a large parking area from which there is access to the rest of the land of the property. Continuing along the interior road, we find the caretakers' house which is totally independent from the main house.  The main entrance leads to a large hall that opens the doors to the social area of the house. On the left hand side we find the space for the dining room and just in front we have a small open and very cozy living room, this leads us to the main living room with fireplace and large windows with curtains that overlook the outside overlooking the pool, in passing we find a closed room, which has room for a more private space, reading room, leisure and games. We have a guest toilet, the dining room with fireplace, surrounded by windows, the kitchen with laundry area and large pantry with service area next to the kitchen with two other bedrooms and a bathroom.  On the second floor there are 3 double bedrooms with closets and bathroom en suite. Climbing a wooden staircase, we reach the second floor. On the second floor we find three bedrooms, two of them en suite and a bedroom with bathroom for in the hall of the rooms. One of the bedrooms has two independent sleeping areas and a terrace of approximately 15 square meters. To access the pool there are stairs made of wood and grass. The space is large, landscaped, the pool very well maintained and with a small house that serves as a support as it has a dressing room, bathroom and a small kitchen. At the same level is the tennis court and a fronton. The house has its own water well which means that there is no water cost, the heating and hot water are by gasoil. El Molar is a Spanish town and municipality in the province and Community of Madrid, 39 km north of the city of Madrid. It is considered the gateway or first town of the Sierra Norte. El Molar has 8 intercity bus lines. 6 of them link the municipality with Madrid capital having the head at the Intercambiador de Plaza de Castilla. These lines are: Line 191, Line 193:Line 193A: Line 194: Line 195: Line 196: Line 197D. In El Molar there are two private kindergartens and one public kindergarten, two public nursery and primary schools, a high school and an adult education center CEPA El Molar.  The municipality of San Agustín de Guadalix is located in the north of the province and the Community of Madrid, in the transition area between the Guadarrama mountain range and the Tajo depression. The urban area is distributed in four large areas: the nucleus of San Agustín, the Valdelagua urbanization and two nuclei of industrial use, to the north and south of the nucleus.

description: YOU ALREADY HAVE A FLAT! We have renovated and painted this duplex so that you can come and live NOW, without having to spend more money. Let me tell you what the apartment has... According to what it says in the deed, 76 m2 built and 56 m2 useful, with a living room/kitchen, two bedrooms, bathroom, toilet, clothesline and another 6.5 m2 more useful storage room, in case you are one of those who don't throw anything away. ….and what it DOESN'T HAVE. In case you don't know it, parking is very good in this area, however, the apartment does not have a garage.And no pool either, the good thing is that the community fee is only €35 and that next door you have the sports center pool. If this is a problem for you, don't waste your time, this is not your apartment. If not or you simply have nothing else better to read. I want you to imagine that you have a living room with natural light, lots of natural light where you enjoy the sun that comes through the windows and energizes you for the whole day. With an area to eat, another to read and another for you to lie on the sofa and spend an afternoon with a blanket and a movie. Or a hangout with friends without worrying about being like sardines in a can. Well, this is what you will do in the 25 m2 living room, from which you will have a hard time kicking out visitors from home. The living room is on the first floor of the duplex with its American kitchen.On this floor you also have a toilet, perfect for not having to climb stairs every time you have an emergency. And finally a clothesline, with a natural gas boiler. On the second floor you have two bedrooms of 10 and 11 m2 each, with that space you can put beds of the size you want.In both, improvements have been made that are important and that will save you money. The built-in wardrobes have been made to measure by a carpenter, saving you money by making them. The walls facing the outside have been insulated, saving money on heating On the second floor there is also a full bathroom, it has a bathtub and we have installed a screen, so that you don't have to install it yourself. As for the building... has it ever happened to you that if it weren't for greeting your neighbor on the stairs, you would swear that you lived alone in the building? Well, the neighbors are that noisy. ….and the neighborhood in accordance with the neighbors, a quiet and familiar area, so if you don't sleep at night, the blame is on the coffees you drink and not on the noise in the area. P.D.I want you to know that it is very likely that the apartment will sell quickly, and not because I say so.If you have compared it with the price and condition of others in the area, you will already know what I am talking about. Also, NO COMMISSIONS, the advertised price is what you pay, with no commissions to add. So if you are really interested….Call REVIALE to visit it. If you wait, maybe, just maybe it's too late.

Grupo Operalia sells an independent villa on a fabulous 894m2 plot in one of the main streets of the Vista Sierra urbanization in the municipality of Molar, 40 kilometers from Madrid. El Molar is a Spanish town and municipality in the province and Community of Madrid, 39 km north of the city. It is located in the Jarama basin, it is within the Madrid tourism zone of the Cuenca del Medio Jarama and the Cuenca del Guadalix, it is one of the accesses to the Madrid mountains. El Molar has 8 intercity bus lines, 6 of which link the municipality with the capital of Madrid, having the head at the Plaza de Castilla interchange. In the surroundings there are Neolithic, pre-Roman and Roman remains, with several watchtowers from the Middle Ages, including the church of the Asunción de Nuestra Señora, the hermitage of San Isidro, and the hermitage of the Virgen del Remolino The municipality of El Molar is known for its caves, which number more than two hundred. They are distributed by the hills of La Muela. In El Molar there are two private nurseries and one public nursery, two public schools for infant and primary education, an institute and an adult education center CEPA El Molar.

El Molar is all this and these are the characteristics and details about this town: - Location: it is located in the northern area of the Community of Madrid, near the Sierra de Guadarrama.It is part of the Cuenca Alta del Manzanares region.The area covered by the term occupies a total of 51.1 km2, being located at an altitude of 810 m and inhabited by 8,491 inhabitants according to the census issued in January 2017.It is oriented towards midday, spreading its hamlet between the hills of La Torreta and La Atalaya, its neighboring municipalities being El Vellón, Talamanca de Jarama, Valdetorres de Jarama, Fuente el Saz, San Agustín del Guadalix and Pedrezuela, in addition to giving way to the northern mountains of Madrid. - Accessibility: from Madrid on the A-1. - Natural Environment: near the Sierra de Guadarrama provides an attractive natural environment.There are opportunities for outdoor activities and enjoyment of nature.The municipal area includes mountains, countryside and plains, while belonging to the Jarama hydrographic basin, located to the west of this waterway. - Culture and Traditions: cultural and traditional events, local festivals, fairs or celebrations that reflect local identity and customs.In the Bodegas de La Torreta area, a great hospitality offering has been developed with a gastronomic offer in which grilled meats and natural wines stand out. - Services: it has essential services such as shops, restaurants and other community services.You have two private daycare centers and one public daycare center, two public bilingual preschool and primary schools, an institute and an adult education center CEPA El Molar. - Transportation: it has 8 intercity bus lines.6 of them link the municipality with Madrid capital, having the head at the Plaza de Castilla Interchange.You can arrive by car via the A1 highway.
